title: Simple Biomes - PCG Starter Kit
description: A beginner friendly and highly expandable PCG starter pack to assist in the development of scenery and open game worlds.
longDescription:
V1.0 Release! Early Adopters will help shape the future of Simple Biomes & All future Simple Suite plugins! Follow along in our development of our plugins, or our game project in our official Discord channel! We're also looking for developers!


[THIS PACK REQUIRES YOU ENABLE PCG - PLEASE READ DOCUMENTATION AND INSTRUCTIONS ON DISCORD FOR HELP]


Simple Biomes is a beginner friendly, lightweight, and easily expandable asset pack that will assist in jumpstarting your worldbuilding. Whether you're a seasoned developer looking for a quicker starting point, or a total beginner looking to learn from scratch, Simple Biomes is a valuable asset to have added to your arsenal. Incorporating a dead-simple Landscape Master Material, as well as an easy-to-follow and beginner friendly PCG Graph designed to sample your landscape layers, you will be able to quickly and efficiently swap out textures and add new biomes.


The Simple Biomes PCG Graph allows you to quickly and easily paint your landscape biomes wherever you may want them in your world, and they will automatically generate and place foliage, nature assets, and any other objects you might want to spawn within your landscape. Each individual asset is easily replaceable and every biome can be customized to the users liking. Object scaling, orientation, and other attributes are also quick to change. Each feature of Simple Biomes will enable you to quickly build out the landscapes and worlds you want with much less hassle!


Simple Biomes marks the start of a planned full suite of plugins and asset packs by Rogue Studios designed to work in tandem with each-other as modules in order to fully piece together projects in a much more "Simple" manner. By purchasing Simple Biomes, you will receive a discount on any future releases of packages that also include Simple Biomes along with them.


For Technical Support, Install Guides, and Documentation, Please join our Discord Community <-- Click
technicalDetails:
Features:

An easy to read and lightweight stylized master landscape material, along with textures to match. A beginner friendly and instructive PCG graph pre-built for many needs. A collection of low-resource/low-poly nature and environment assets for various pre-set biomes. Easy to follow Get-Started guide and active Discord developer support.


Number of Blueprints: 1 PCG Graph

Landscape Materials: 5

Meshes: 151

Materials: 26

Textures: 48

Maps: 1

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
